title: Compose a type-related limerick!
content:
I’ll go first:

A kid was often confused,  
When setting his p’s and his q’s  
He was very keen on qleasing the pueen  
Who wasn’t entirely amused!

 [‹ Ruh, roh!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122111838/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46304 "Go to previous forum topic") [looking for a spanish flavoured typeface for a bible ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122111838/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48403 "Go to next forum topic")
author: oprion

comments.content:
Don’t most limericks have five lines?

edit: Sorry, didn’t read it right the first time.
